title: Observations in Support of Astrophysics at the Jodrell Bank Centre for Astrophysics
abstractText: Astrophysics research at the Jodrell Bank Centre for Astrophysics covers a wide range of subjects including cosmology, galaxies, star formation and the late stages of stellar evolution. This proposal is to provide funds to support travel to various observatories to obtain measurements of astronomical objects over the wavelength range from the optical to the submillimetre and radio to further this research.
